𒍗 used for 𒌀 late form

mūtu 𒍗 ⋍ 𓏱 muert “death”
ÚŠ 𒍗 ⋍ 𒍗 ᵟésHr̥ “death, blood, gore”
ÚŠ 𒍗 ⋍ 𒁁 uš₂ ᵟésHr̥
ÚŠ 𒍗 ≠ 𒁁 BÀD "blood"

𒍗 ᵇÚŠ bush "dead reed" 𒍗 ᵇÚŠ 𓃀 ᶠÚŠ Fuß

𓃀 ⋍ 𒁇 ⋍ 𒁁 bad/pod 𒁁 ⋍ 𒉽𒄬PaDemi 𒈦 bar 𒁇

ÚŠ 𒍗 ___ to shut off, block up

𓂧 𓈙 𓂋 𓂐 blood désHr̥ ⋍> death ?

𒀂 = 𒀀𒁁/𒀀𒍗 A×MUERT = marsh

Seeming [Bivalence] is also attested in 𒀫 būru/AMAR (bull/mare)
